c:atomType.name: NullInterpolationMode
c:atomType.c:documentation:
The mode of interpolation for filling null or missing measure values.
Some chart types show visual elements corresponding to interpolated data points with a different visual style. The automatically generated visual element tooltips indicate that the associated data point is the result of interpolation.

c:atom.name: None
c:atom.c:documentation: Null values or missing datums are shown as a visual gap.

c:atom.name: Zero
c:atom.c:documentation: Data is interpolated using the constant value 0 to fill-in null values or missing datums.

c:atom.name: Linear
c:atom.c:documentation: Data is linearly interpolated to fill-in null values or missing datums.
